About Us
.entry-header
About Sun n Shade
As soon as you pull off highway 41, and enter our premises, you’ll appreciate the beauty and serenity of Sun’ n’ Shade campground. A walk down any of our streets may remind you of the past, a quiet simple time when neighborhoods were full of friends that knew and looked out for each other. A time when pride in ones home and yard was as natural as the surrounding countryside. If this lifestyle sounds appealing to you, then let Sun’ n’ Shade provide a safe, quiet home away from home for you.
We boast a variety of amenities, including:
The Pavilion (community center): This spacious building features the main hall, restrooms and a functional service kitchen for dinners, parties, etc. The pavilion is equipped with tables and chairs for 100+ guests
Heated Swimming Pool: At 84 degrees, it’s comfortable year-round and is plenty large enough to swim laps. Tables, chairs and lounges offer the choice of sunbathing or snoozing in the shade. Guests are encouraged to bring a picnic and make a day of it. And what better way to enjoy a sunny day in Florida?! And, of course, it’s always a fine place to throw a party.
Feeling competitive? Try out our horseshoe pits, shuffleboard, and chipping range complete with a sand trap to practice those dreaded bunker shots.
There are picnic tables in the areas that folks tend to congregate, as well as on every site.
Our ceramic tile washrooms and showers are kept sparkling clean, as is our conveniently located laundry facility.
.entry-content
